statements: SELECT * FROM Registration ORDER BY registration_id DESC
SELECT product_name, company_name, registration_date FROM Registration WHERE product_name = 'Product A'
SELECT company_name FROM Registration WHERE registration_id > 100 ORDER BY registration_id ASC
SELECT registration_id, product_name FROM Registration WHERE company_name = 'Company B'
SELECT * FROM Registration WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM Registration WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT registration_id, product_name FROM Registration WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_name ASC, registration_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS total_registrations FROM Registration GROUP BY company_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT product_name, company_name, COUNT(*) AS total_registrations FROM Registration WHERE product_name LIKE '%software%' GROUP BY product_name, company_name ORDER BY total_registrations DESC;
SELECT registration_id, product_name, company_name, registration_date FROM Registration WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM ProductRegistrations;
SELECT registration_id, product_name FROM ProductRegistrations WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, registration_date FROM ProductRegistrations WHERE registration_date > '2021-06-30';
SELECT registration_id, application_rate, application_date FROM ApplicationRates WHERE application_rate > 10.0;

SELECT registration_id, product_name, registration_date, application_rate, application_date FROM ProductRegistrations INNER JOIN ApplicationRates ON ProductRegistrations.registration_id = ApplicationRates.registration_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductRegistrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, registration_date FROM ProductRegistrations WHERE registration_id > 100 ORDER BY registration_id ASC
SELECT AVG(application_rate) AS average_rate FROM ApplicationRates WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_name, registration_date, application_rate FROM ProductRegistrations PR INNER JOIN ApplicationRates AR ON PR.registration_id = AR.registration_id WHERE AR.application_rate > 50
SELECT * FROM ProductRegistrations WHERE registration_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY registration_date DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, registration_date FROM products ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM application_rates WHERE application_rate > 0.5;
SELECT product_id, residue_level FROM residue_levels WHERE test_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT id, name FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name = 'Apple'
SELECT name, registration_date FROM products ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT products.name, residue_levels.residue_level, residue_levels.test_date FROM products INNER JOIN residue_levels ON products.id = residue_levels.product_id WHERE residue_level > 0.5
SELECT products.name, application_rates.application_rate FROM products INNER JOIN application_rates ON products.id = application_rates.product_id ORDER BY application_rate ASC

SELECT products.name, residue_levels.residue_level, application_rates.application_rate FROM products INNER JOIN residue_levels ON products.id = residue_levels.product_id INNER JOIN application_rates ON products.id = application_rates.product_id WHERE residue_level < 0.2 AND application_rate > 0.3
SELECT * FROM product_registrations;
SELECT registration_id, product_name, company_name FROM product_registrations;
SELECT registration_id, product_name, company_name, registration_date FROM product_registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, product_name, registration_date FROM product_registrations WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT company_name, country, contact_person FROM companies WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, company_name, registration_date FROM product_registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM application_rates WHERE rate > 100 ORDER BY application_date ASC;
SELECT company_name, country FROM companies WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT AVG(residue_level) AS average_level, registration_id FROM residue_levels GROUP BY registration_id HAVING AVG(residue_level) > 50;
SELECT application_id, registration_id, MAX(rate) AS max_rate FROM application_rates GROUP BY registration_id ORDER BY max_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductRegistrations;
SELECT product_name, registration_date FROM ProductRegistrations WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT company_name, location FROM Companies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT registration_id, application_rate FROM ApplicationRates WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ResidueLevels ORDER BY residue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductRegistrations;
SELECT pr.product_name, pr.manufacturer, ar.application_rate FROM ProductRegistrations pr JOIN ApplicationRates ar ON pr.registration_id = ar.registration_id;

SELECT cr.company_name, pr.product_name, rl.residue_level FROM Companies cr JOIN CompanyProducts cp ON cr.company_id = cp.company_id JOIN ProductRegistrations pr ON cp.registration_id = pr.registration_id JOIN ResidueLevels rl ON pr.registration_id = rl.registration_id;

SELECT pr.product_name, pr.manufacturer, ar.application_rate, cr.company_name FROM ProductRegistrations pr JOIN ApplicationRates ar ON pr.registration_id = ar.registration_id JOIN CompanyProducts cp ON pr.registration_id = cp.registration_id JOIN Companies cr ON cp.company_id = cr.company_id;

SELECT pr.product_name, pr.manufacturer, ar.application_rate, rl.residue_level, cr.company_name FROM ProductRegistrations pr JOIN ApplicationRates ar ON pr.registration_id = ar.registration_id JOIN ResidueLevels rl ON pr.registration_id = rl.registration_id JOIN CompanyProducts cp ON pr.registration_id = cp.registration_id JOIN Companies cr ON cp.company_id = cr.company_id;
